name: location_information
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool instagram_v5.
Tool description: Fast Live Instagram API.All information from Instagram consistently and quickly! It makes 3 times in the backend request for you to get 100% successful response. Need help or custom plan? https://instagapi.com - https://t.me/instagapi
API description: Get Instagram location information by Instagram location id.

locationid.description: The Instagram location ID to retrieve information for.
